oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-04-13 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from April 13, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) with his Smoky Mountain Boys, guest performer Justin Tubb, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Howdy Forrester, Pap's Jug Band, Minnie Pearl, and Bashful Brother Oswald. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 914th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pap's Jug Band; Minnie Pearl; Randy Hughes; Justin Tubb; Bashful Brother Oswald; Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys; Howdy Forrester
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Roy Acuff introduces the Jug Band -- They Cut Down The Old Pine Tree (Pap's Jug Band) -- Roy Acuff introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert commercial (Bashful Brother Oswald, Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert jingle (Randy Hughes) -- Roy Acuff introduces Justin Tubb -- The Life I Have To Live (Justin Tubb) -- Roy Acuff introduces Bashful Brother Oswald -- Southern Moon (Bashful Brother Oswald) -- Roy Acuff talks -- Sunshine Special (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys) -- Roy Acuff introduces Howdy Forrester -- Paddy On The Turnpike (Howdy Forrester) -- Closing statement (Roy Acuff) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Jackson, Shot; Riddle, Jimmy, 1918-1982; Bashful Brother Oswald; Hughes, Randy, 1928-1963; Pap's Jug Band; Forrester, Howdy, 1922-1987; Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Tubb, Justin
